title: "Artificial Intelligence creates Donald Trump as pumpkin and Elon Musk as scarecrow"
excerpt: "A man has used AI to give well-known faces a spooky makeover - reimagining Rishi Sunak as Dracula and Donald Trump as a pumpkin. Other images include Joe Biden as Freddy Krueger, Beyonce as a witch, Elon Musk as a scarecrow and Keir Starmer as Frankenstein ..."
